name.description: Name of the third party recipient

VendorActionPlans.description: The Vendor Action Plan names available based on the number of Vendor Action Plans configured (2 or 3)

alias.description: The alias that the vulnerability is also known as

confidence.description: The confidence in findings for this vulnerability, either HIGH or LOW.

cvss.description: The cvss of the vulnerability, currently only include the base score

base.description: The base score of the cvss

display_name.description: The name that should be displayed

is_enabled.description: Indicates whether this alert type's settings are enabled or not

created_time.description: The date when this bulk upload was created

guid.description: A unique identifier of this bulk upload

length.description: De-duped number of IPv4 addresses detected in the file

updated_time.description: The date when this bulk upload was updated
